mapper.select: SELECT TB_OPTION_TYPE.TY_CD AS TY_CD ,TB_OPTION.OPT_CD AS OPT_CD ,TB_OPTION.OPT_NM AS OPT_NM FROM TB_OPTION_TYPE INNER JOIN TB_OPTION ON TB_OPTION_TYPE.TY_CD = TB_OPTION.TY_CD INNER JOIN TB_ITEM ON TB_OPTION_TYPE.IT_CD = TB_ITEM.IT_CD INNER JOIN TB_CART ON TB_ITEM.IT_CD = TB_CART.IT_CD WHERE TB_CART.CART_CD = #{cartCd}

SELECT TB_CART.CART_CD AS CART_CD ,TB_ITEM.IT_CD AS IT_CD ,TB_ITEM.IT_NM AS IT_NM ,TB_ITEM.IMG_CD AS IMG_CD ,TB_ITEM.PRICE AS PRICE ,TB_CART.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT ,TB_CART.MB_ID AS MB_ID ,TB_OPTION.OPT_CD AS OPT_CD ,TB_OPTION.OPT_NM AS OPT_NM FROM TB_CART TB_CART INNER JOIN TB_ITEM TB_ITEM ON TB_CART.IT_CD = TB_ITEM.IT_CD LEFT JOIN TB_OPTION TB_OPTION ON TB_CART.OPT_CD = TB_OPTION.OPT_CD WHERE MB_ID = #{mbId} ORDER BY TB_CART.CART_CD
